original: apply Z_coprime. exists (α n), (-1). rewrite <- Z.add_opp_r. rewrite Z.mul_1_l. rewrite Z.mul_opp_r. rewrite Z.add_comm. assert (alpha_eq: forall n, α (S (S n)) = b * α (S n) - α n). - intros. apply alpha_fix_3. assert (Pell_eq: forall n, Pell (α (S n)) (α n)). - intros. apply alpha_Pell. apply Pell_eq in Pell. destruct Pell as [u v Pell_eq]. exists u, v. rewrite <- Pell_eq. rewrite alpha_eq. apply Z.add_wd. + reflexivity. + rewrite Z.mul_assoc. rewrite Z.mul_assoc. reflexivity.
